reviews.customers_say: Customers love this turtleneck sweater for its formfitting design, high-quality fabric, and soft feel, with one customer noting it has no pilling.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars warm, form-fitting, and vibrant
items.body: this is a quality shirt! the color is as vibrant as shown in the photos, which i love because it’s hard to find colorful clothing in the winter months. the material is thick and soft, and the sewing is not see-through. the fit is form-fitting without being too tight. the best part is, this turtleneck is warm! i wore it in 30 degree weather today and it kept me cozy. Read more
items.author: Stacey Stallons

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous!
items.body: Great quality. This is a nice, thick turtleneck. I am 5’3” and 130 lbs. I ordered a Medium and it fits perfectly. I ordered red and it is a true red, not an orange-red. Does not have blue undertones either. The neck and arms are slightly long but it does not look bulky or unsightly if cuffed. I turned the bottom of the neck under slightly and it looks great! Exactly what I was looking for to complete my outfit. . Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: melanie rice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful!
items.body: This is a lovely turtleneck! The fabric is thick and soft and the sleeves are nice and long, which is great because I hav long arms! I love this and plan to buy another one! Read more
items.author: fitvegan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommended!!
items.body: Love this sweater! It fits true to size, snug and flattering. I use it for air travel, it’s warm and great for layering while looking good. I have it in about 6 colors, it’s soft, comfortable, and I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: TM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classic Turltlenecks/Beautiful Colors
items.body: Ordered 4 colors. Sea grass, light blue, morandi pink and mustard. Pink was darker than expected, (returned), blue was between colors for me (returned), sea grass is absolutely gorgeous, and kept! Mustard is a spectacular color. However, mustard sweater had poorly sewn shoulders which bunched up. Not fixable. Returned and replaced and just fine ! None of the other colors had a fit problem. Overall they are lovely turtlenecks of a classic but updated fit and slimming. Am 5'3 105 lbs. Ordered size Small. Also am skin sensitive, and feel great. Would order again ! Read more
items.author: MARY

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality sweater!
items.body: Best turtleneck sweater I have ever bought! I love these sweaters for the winter. The fabric is thick. It stretches but bonces back and doesnt lose shape. I bought the Black. Then I brought gray. I was hoping the gray was darker but still just as nice! So many colors to choose from. Great quality! I love it/ I bought a 2X like they recommended and it fits perfect. Read more
items.author: GLORIA S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE! Not too short.
items.body: I recently lost about 3 sizes (thanks to COVID, I no longer get hungry. Ever) and needed new turtlenecks, which are hard to buy online. I like a true turtleneck that I can scrunch (not too loose) and hate mock necks. I ordered red from this company and 2 from Rocorose because I own 2 of their turtleneck dresses and love them. The red one I purchased from this seller wins. And the red is great for the holidays. I wear a medium but bought large and coming out of the bag, it looks way small. But I tried it on anyway. NOT too small. Fitted and medium weight - not too thin or too bulky. The Rocorose are equally nice but hit me just above my hip This one is about 2 inches longer, and you can ruche it around the tummy area if you are my age (50 something) and have that little pouche that never goes away. Returning the other brand (you'll like Rocorose if you want shorter) and buying 3 more here. Great look and fits well to layer also. I thought I'd like the others better (and they were a little less expensive on Black Friday deal). Wrong. I want all of the colors now. A+ Read more
items.author: MDT00

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Colo wheel is broken!
items.body: Weight and fit of sweater was excellent. Color was WAY OFF. I wanted a burgundy sweater to match my outfit. However, what received closer to red. Someone commented that it was a beautiful cranberry color. I also ordered a red one that is more of a bright red/fuschia color. For that one I expected a deeper red (crayon color) red. Nice fabric terrible color identification Read more
items.author: Shady

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray Lilac, Jadeblue, Black, Babyblue, Coffee, Lightgrey, Softgrass, Nude, Orange, Lime, Plum, Tender Green, Morandi Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
